dmca.title: Copyright infrigement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 


  _____  

From: admin@e-topbiz.com [mailto:admin@e-topbiz.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 21, 2005 4:59 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infrigement


Hi!
 
I am the owner of site E-topbiz.com and my name is Goran. I live in Croatia.
 
I sold few scripts with resell rights to owner of site Kiwi247.com which is
hosted on one of your servers (Server IP 70.86.129.149 , nameservers
NS1.MYPCHOST.COM and NS2.MYPCHOST.COM) , but my terms says that scripts that
are purchased with resell rights can not be sold for less than I sell them.
And this is exactly what this person doing on his site.
 
I contacted him yesterday and kindly explained the problem, but he refused
to obbey this rules. I also told him that I will be forced to report him to
hosting data center, but he told me "I know my host very well so that would
be a lost cause". His complete email is available for review if needed.
 
I kindly ask you to resolve this any way you find suitable (suspend his
account or entire server if needed).
 
INFO:
 
- domain: kiwi247.com
- server IP: 70.86.129.149
- nameservers he use: NS1.MYPCHOST.COM and NS2.MYPCHOST.COM

Scripts that he purchased from me and that he sells for lower prices on his
site:
-  <http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=1>
http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=1
-  <http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=2>
http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=2
-  <http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=3>
http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=3
-  <http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=4>
http://www.kiwi247.com/products.php?cid=4
 
Where on my site is stated that all scripts purchased with resell rights can
not be sold for less then I sell them:
-  <http://e-topbiz.com/> http://e-topbiz.com/ , under "Scripts With Resell
Rights - Scripts With Master Resell Rights"
-  <http://e-topbiz.com/terms.htm> http://e-topbiz.com/terms.htm
- all pages with scripts description, which makes almost 50 pages
 
Scripts that kiwi247.com sells for lower prices on my site, listed in same
order as above listing with links on his site:
- http://e-topbiz.com/oprema/pages/ptr3.htm
- http://e-topbiz.com/oprema/pages/autosurfscript7.htm
- http://e-topbiz.com/oprema/pages/safelist3.htm
- http://e-topbiz.com/oprema/pages/viral1.htm
 
Hope to see this resolved soon!
 
Thanks for your time.
 
Regards
Goran Kusnjer
E-topbiz.com owner
